messages.text: Something settled into the core of my being.
Because as much as I hated Mr. Archivolt and the way he’d treated me and my friends,
I knew that he was right. I was a vampire.
For the first time, I knew exactly who I was—my life made sense.
You see?
It’s time for your Becoming…
I can tell by the way that you’re holding yourself now.
You’re ready for this.
You’ve CHOOSEN it.
And I needed you to come to this realization...
MR. ARCHIVOLT checked his watch and smiled.
At this exact moment in your life.
Why?
Because it’s your birthday.
You were born sixteen years ago today,
At this very minute.
Which means, it’s time to Become one of us.
Sorry, but I’m not interested in becoming an asshole.
I saw a flash of fire in Mr. Archivolt’s eyes
And he swiped at Abby with something…
Opening a long gash in one of her legs.
She cried out in pain.
STOP!!! I’ll do whatever you want!
I’ll join whatever it is you want me to join…
But, please, you have to let Abby go.
Unfortunately, that won’t be possible .
Abby will die.
And the person who will kill her…is you.
No…never. I won’t do it.
Oh, you will.
To become one of us you must take Abby’s life.
You must sever your ties with humankind.
You mean my friends?
They aren’t worthy of your friendship.
You are so much more.
He’s insane, Ki.
Get out of here while you can!
You’re crazy if you think I’ll ever hurt Abby.
I’d die first.
Dying isn’t an option for you, Kiara.
You’re an immortal.
But it’s a fact for Abby. I’ll kill her if you don’t.
As Mr. Archivolt slowly raised his hand to Abby’s face…
I realized he’d been using the nails of his fingers to torture her.
Long and steely-black, they flashed menacingly in the candlelight.
Don’t you touch her!
But he does.
He slams her head against the stone wall…
Knocking her unconscious.
That should make it easier for you.
I told you, I won’t do it.
You’re not the first to say that, though most accept their fate.
But the fact of the matter is, in the end, we all do it.
We have no choice. It’s in our nature.
I told you, I’d rather die.
And I explained that you can’t.
But you can suffer. And you will, if you don’t feed.
It is a pain like you cannot imagine, Kiara.
And the longer you fight it, the worse it gets.
Eventually, you’ll grow ill with fever and dementia.
And then, finally, you’ll wake in a daze to discover…
You did it anyway.
Surely you don’t want to lose control like that
But why does it have to be Abby?
Because like that Maya Fernandez girl…
Abby is destined to become a witch.
Can you imagine the extent of your power, of our power, if you feasted on a child like this at your Becoming?
Actually, no.
As I already told you, I’m not hurting my friends.
So I won’t imagine it—not under any circumstances.
And second of all, I don’t understand why you think I have so much power.
Seems to me that you and I have the same amount.
That is precisely why you’re so powerful…
Because you have the potential to be as great as me.
You have powers you wouldn’t believe, Kiara.
You are… special.
Even among us, you are a rarity.
You mean a freak?
Believe me, no one is calling you that.
Kiara, you are the first natural born vampire in a thousand years.
You may become the most powerful one of all time.
And when you drink that witch’s blood…
You will make our entire species more powerful as a result.
Out of the corner of my eye, I saw Connor lick his lips
And my stomach lurched in disgust.
The clock is ticking. Your Becoming is upon us.
Connor, hand me the book.
I will read the incantation as Kiara takes her first bite.
No!
Don’t be foolish. One way or another, Abby dies tonight.
Question is, will she die for nothing, by my hand?
Or by yours, so you can embrace what you are…
Choose. NOW.
